src:
Dua Truk Kontainer Kecelakaan di KM 57 Tol Jakarta-Cikampek, Lalin Padat
07 Nov 2019, 02:04 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - Kecelakaan terjadi di ruas tol Jakarta-Cikampek KM 57, tepatnya sebelum rest area Karawang Timur. Kecelakaan melibakan dua truk kontainer.
"Benar terjadi kecelakaan 2 truk kontainer di tol Jakarta-Cikampek sebelum rest area Karawang Timur," ujar petugas call center Jasa Marga Ahmad, saat dikonfirmasi Kamis (7/11/2019).
Ahmad mengatakan, saat ini petugas tengah melakukan penanganan ke lokasi kejadian. Kecelakaan dilaporkan terjadi di satu ruas jalan sebelah kiri.
"Kecelakaan terjadi di lajur satu sebelah kiri, informasi kondisi saat ini masih dalam penanganan petugas," kata Ahmad.
Disebutkan, terjadi kepadatan arus lalu lintas dilokasi kejadian. Belum diketahui, informasi lebih lanjut terkait ada tidaknya korban dalam kecelakaan tersebut.
"Kepadatan terjadi hanya menjelang lokasi kejadian, kepadatan tidak mencapai satu kilo," tuturya.

(dwia/fdu)
text:
Two Crash Container Trucks at KM 57 Jakarta-Cikampek Toll Road, Solid Traffic
Nov 7 2019, 02:04 by Dwi Andayani
Jakarta - The accident occurred at the Jakarta-Cikampek KM 57 toll road, precisely before the East Karawang rest area. The accident involved two container trucks.
"It is true there were two container truck accidents on the Jakarta-Cikampek toll road before the East Karawang rest area," said Jasa Marga Ahmad call center officer, when confirmed on Thursday (11/07/2019).
Ahmad said, at this time the officer was carrying out the handling to the scene. The accident was reported to occur in one lane on the left.
"The accident occurred in the first lane on the left, information on the current condition is still in the handling of officers," Ahmad said.
It was mentioned, there was a density of traffic flow at the scene. Not yet known, further information related to the presence or absence of victims in the accident.
"The density occurs only before the scene, the density does not reach one kilo," he said.

(dwia / fdu)
